page.title: 07Carlton Sports Club
page.content: Carlton Towers Cricket Club is situated on the outskirts of Carlton. It has been playing at this present pitch since l895,but before that they played in the grounds of Carlton Towers. The cricket club has been successful in the local leagues for the past 25 years. Every year the cricket club plays an annual match against Lord Edwards ll, who is the Duke of Norfolk's son. Carlton's Fish Pond is situated on the outskirts of the village, across the road from the cricket club.It is a large pond,and from the road it stretches back out of sight.A swan and her family live on the pond, according to local people it is quite vicious. The pond has a good stock of fish large Pike, Tench, Trout, Bream and Roach.
